name: Dynamic Query Filter
author: Adlwebsolutions

sections.description:
Dynamic Query Filter is an Elementor widget that enhances LMS websites, blog listings, page listings, and resource
pages by providing dynamic post filtering using ACF Relationship fields.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/dynamic-query-filter directory, or install the plugin through
    the WordPress plugin screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. The widget will be available in the Elementor Editor.
  4. Drag and drop the “Dynamic Query Filter” widget into your desired section.
sections.faq:
1. Does this plugin require any other plugins?
    Yes, this widget is compatible only with Elementor and Elementor Pro editors.

  2. How do I use this widget in Elementor?
    Simply drag and drop the widget in the Elementor editor. You can add a title and a short description, and filter posts
    dynamically based on ACF Relationship fields, categories, or authors. It’s ideal for LMS platforms or resource pages, offering flexible content management.
